GR13cakbhavu:14: caturthyantapadāveditatatsvarūpasarvāvedananayena unmanībhāvaḥ tatsamāviṣṭena sūcitaḥ, tena tatra mano vilāpayāmīty arthaḥ /

GR13cakbhavu:15_1: yo 'paharatīti tacchīlo 'yam akramapadena darśitaḥ, sūrīnāmakalājālena madhyamadhāmānuvedhena

GR13cakbhavu:52: Viv: pāśānām -- āṇavamāyīyakārmikāṇām malānām oghaḥ tasya saṃghaṭṭa ahetukena kenāpi krameṇa ullāsaḥ, tena vā tatra vā tasya vā yo 'yaṃ layaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:53: tathā viśleṣaḥ pṛthagbhāvas tatkaraṇaśīlatvena vartamānāya sadā tritayakāritvān nāntarīyakaṃ tirodhānānugrahakāritvaṃ dhvanitam /
GR13cakbhavu:54_0: [mantragarbhodarasthāya] ity atra tridhā gurvāmnāyaḥ -- mantrā varṇarūpā garbhe yasyāḥ

GR13cakbhavu:55_1: tatra sthitā, athavā mananatrāṇadharmitvān marīciṣu sthityuditāsu mantra ityādirūpatayā

GR13cakbhavu:74_1: prakarṣeṇeritā satī prasarati, iti mam na kaś caid aparādha ity ahaṃ tatsamāveśita
GR13cakbhavu:74_2: evoditaḥ, yady ahaṃ nāma kaś cid anyo
GR13cakbhavu:75: bhaveyaṃ, bhaven nāma aparādho, yadi param aparādho 'py aham api bhavān

GR13cakbhavu:80_1: tena vivaśā viśiṣṭā vaśeva kareṇur iva nijabodharasacarvaṇasadāvaraṇanirāvaraṇamadavighūrṇitatvād
GR13cakbhavu:80_2: viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya sa tathā, ity anenaitad uktaṃ bhavati---na tad vācyaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:80_3: kṛtyaṃ vā kiṃcana yat tvatparicarvaṇacārurūpatayā na cakāsti /

GR13cakbhavu:130_1: āhvānopakramaṃ visarjanam avagatatattvah kaḥ karoti, vyatiriktadeśakālasaṃbhave hi
GR13cakbhavu:130_2: kasya cid ānayanaṃ kutra cit prahāṇaṃ saṃbhāvyeta, iha tu sarvasyaiva tanmayatvāt
GR13cakbhavu:130_3: kasyāhvānaṃ kuta āhvānaṃ, kasya visarjanaṃ kutra ca visarjanam iti

GR13cakbhavu:220: Q: tad ākramya balaṃ mantrāḥ iti /
GR13cakbhavu:221: evaṃvidhaṃ japamakaraṇakaraṇena nirvartya, śivāya svātmamaheśvare tādarthyena viśeṣeṇa niravaśeṣaṃ buddhye samyak,
GR13cakbhavu:222: ityevaṃvidhamahāvīryasphārasāmarasyamayasatatoditajapāvadhānātirekeṇa paśūnāṃ japa uccaritapradhvaṃsivarṇanirvartyaḥ, etat paramārthatāyām api
GR13cakbhavu:223: nirvīryabījatayā na samyaksiddhisādhanabhāvam aśnuta ity uktaṃ bhavati
GR13cakbhavu:225: CakBhst_31cd: anābilaṃ parāṃ vyāptiṃ mudrāṃ badhnāmi dhūrjaṭe
GR13cakbhavu:226: Viv: dhunoti sarvaṃ, raṃhati sarvatra, janayati sarvaṃ, ṭīkate sarvatra iti āgūritākramacatuṣṭayārtho dhūrjaṭiḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:227: etāṃ layodayamudrām ekām api pañcadhā vakṣyamāṇanayena sphurantīṃ badhnāmy ātmasātkaromi /
GR13cakbhavu:228: akhilārthaparihāre vā svīkāre vā askhalanāt aparicchinnamahiman?
GR13cakbhavu:234: paravyomni vyāptyunmimiṣāsaṃjihīrṣātmakollāsopaśamasîdhyaiva khe caratīti khecarī ity etallakṣaṇalakṣitatayaiva sarvamudrîṇîm iyam ekaiva pañcadhî
GR13cakbhavu:236: CakBhst_32ab: śaṣkulīkarṇayor baddhvā yo rāvo 'tra vijṛmbhate
GR13cakbhavu:237: CakBhst_32cd: tadgītam atha te vādyam ādyasaṃpuṭaghaṭṭanāt
GR13cakbhavu:238: Viv: śrotrapuṭikayor yo 'ntarninadann iva sāmānyasvarūpo yo 'sau, gītaṃ sa eva, ādyakandobhayapakṣasaṃkocāt nānānāḍīveṇuvane vicarann
GR13cakbhavu:242: gopya iti pāṭhe bhagavata āmantraṇaṃ svaprakāsatvās ananyaprakāsya! ityarthaḥ, śaṣkulīkarṇayor ādyasaṃpuṭaghaṭṭanād yo rāvas tad gītam iti anvīyate //32//
GR13cakbhavu:243: CakBhst_33ab: bhavadbhāvarasāveśāt tāṇḍavāḍambaroddhataḥ CakBhst_33cd: mantrādhvani nadāmy antaḥ kim u bāhyārthabhāvanaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:244_0: Viv: tvanmayotkarṣeṣu śṛṅgārādiṣv api raseṣv āveśāt tvadanukārivikīrṇanijamarīcimayakarakalpitasaṃkīrṇāsaṃkīrṇapatākādisamudbodhitabhāvavaibhavābhinayo
GR13cakbhavu:245: nṛttam ārabhe, tad uktaṃ mayā śivarātrivicāravārtike
GR13cakbhavu:250: mantrādhvani dhvanidhāmani guptabhāṣaṇapravaṇapaśyantīpade, yad vā vācyavācakādhvaṣaṭkamadhyavartipañcamantramahimani, nadāmi cidbhairavaikaghanatāpramodena garjāmi /
GR13cakbhavu:251: kiṃ varākair bāhyaviṣayavikalpātaṅkaiḥ, iti pararasaparitṛptimahodgāraṃ prakaṭayati
GR13cakbhavu:252: ``na māmy antaḥ kim u bāhye 'tra bhauvane'' iti vā pāṭhaḥ, tatra na māmi
GR13cakbhavu:253: na varte kim u bhauvane kalādāv akalānte bhuvanādhvanītyarthaḥ //33//
GR13cakbhavu:255: CakBhst_34cd: upariṣṭān mayā śambhor vitānam upakalpitam
GR13cakbhavu:256: Viv: vitanoti sarvaṃ vitanyate vā sarvatra iti vitānam //34//
GR13cakbhavu:258: CakBhst_35cd: dhāryate dhūrjaṭer agre cārucāmaravan mayā
GR13cakbhavu:262: CakBhst_36cd: tālavṛntair iva vibho vījyase haṃsamārutaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:263: Viv: visṛtaiḥ praviṣṭaiḥ, prasṛtaiḥ, haṃsamārutaiḥ prāṇapavanais tāluvṛntair ivotkṣepakatulyaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:265: CakBhst_37cd: ātapatram athāsmābhir & dhāryate te mahāśaya
GR13cakbhavu:269: Viv: bhavanirāvaraṇavijayayātropakrame niyatāhantāmamatāparikṣaye pūrṇāhantātmako 'haṅkāro hayas tvadativahanāya //38//
GR13cakbhavu:273: nijabodhānandanandanodyānapraphullo, nāgaḥ śarīraḥ pavanaviśeṣas tasya vallī prathamaprāṇodbhedaśaktiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:276: CakBhst_40cd: advaitāgnau juhomy antaḥ & śāṃkare sreyasām nidhau
GR13cakbhavu:281: sūkṣmakaraṇaśaktitaduparamāṅgulipañcakopaśobhitābhyāṃ taduparivartanād ``unmanyante paraḥ śivaḥ'' iti dṛśā unmanāsrucaṃ parigṛhya pūrṇāṃ juhomi,
GR13cakbhavu:282: iti saṃkṣayapradhānāyām api vṛttāv aviluptam eva pāripūrṇyam---iti
GR13cakbhavu:285: Q: svānandatas tribhuvanaṃ kavalaṃ vidhāya & svātmānam apy atitarāṃ samadā grasantī Q: tṛptā tathāpy aparikhaṇḍitanityasiddha&svātantryapūrṇavibhavā
GR13cakbhavu:289_0: Viv: bāhyavyāvṛttivigamapūrvakam antarmananam anantatayā sphuraṇam antarmānaṃ tadvidhau,
GR13cakbhavu:289_1: tvadanubhavaśaśiprakāśavivaśīkṛtaḥ, cittam eva cintāmaṇir bhavatsamāveśena tadvad
GR13cakbhavu:290: CakBhst_43ab: mokṣalakṣmīkarāmbhoja&pātre vinyasya saṃskṛtām CakBhst_43cd: nivedayāmi bhagavan & prāṇasarvasvadakṣiṇām
GR13cakbhavu:291: Viv: prāṇā eva teṣāṃ vā sarvasvam āṇavaṃ svarūpaṃ, tan
GR13cakbhavu:294: mokṣalakṣmyā bhavaunmukhyaparāvṛttāyāḥ saṃviddevyāḥ karāmbhasi paramavīciniḥṣyande jātaṃ yat pātram pātatrāṇātmakam aviluptam
GR13cakbhavu:296: tad evaṃ māyopakalpitatattadavacchedavicchedikramākramacakracāramahāsāmarasyasamāpattipratipādanena yad eva ``namaḥ sūryakalā'' ityādinā prakrāntaṃ tad eva paryavasitam //43//
GR13cakbhavu:297: CakBhst_44ab: saṃsāravāridheḥ santaḥ & paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥ
GR13cakbhavu:299: Viv: śrayantv avadhānena sevantāṃ, bhāvapūjāmayaṃ taraṇḍakaṃ potam //44//
GR13cakbhavu:300: CakBhst_45ab: ittham īśānacaraṇa&nuter yat samupārjitam CakBhst_45cd: śreyas tena jagat kṛtsnaṃ & dveṣadoṣād vimucyatām
GR13cakbhavu:304: Q: māyeyaṃ bahurūpatām upagatā nānā yathā te vibho & vidyāpy evam anantabhedagahanā no cet kathaṃ syād idam /
GR13cakbhavu:305: Q: naiḥsvābhāvyagamena ke cana pare vaiviktyataḥ ke 'pi vā & sārvātmyena pare taduttaradṛśā muktāḥ pare sarvatah // iti /
GR13cakbhavu:308: Q: yady atattvaparihārapūrvakaṃ & tattvam eṣi tad atattvam eva hi /
GR13cakbhavu:309: Q: yady atattvam atha tattvam eva vā & tattvam eva nanu tattvam īdṛśam //
GR13cakbhavu:314_0: Viv: viśvasya sākṣī viśvarūpo vāmantryate, mānāvamānayoḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇayor niṣprapañcaprapañcayor
GR13cakbhavu:314_1: mamatayojjhitā cittavṛttir yasya tadyuktā vā tyaktā cittavṛttir yena, aṃhaḥ pāpaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:314_2: haratīti, ahaṃkṛd eva vāṅghris tadyugam anāvaraṇajñānakriyārūpaṃ tasya pīṭhaṃ paramaśivarūpaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:315_0: avabodhabhūtivibhavena avaguṇṭhitā ācchāditās tanavo mitatayā sphurantaḥ sarvabhāvā
GR13cakbhavu:315_1: yena, nuḥ aṇor yat kapālaṃ, kaṃ mahāsvātantryarūpam anavacchinnaṃ brahma pālayati
GR13cakbhavu:315_2: gopayatīti nṛkapālaṃ karparaṃ tat pāṇau ekasmin udbubhūṣāmarīcilakṣaṇe mitatayā iyattayā
GR13cakbhavu:317: CakBhst_47cd: cakre ciccakranāthasya & śambhor bhāvanutiṃ parām
GR13cakbhavu:318_0: Viv: ``nirastaśāstrārthavikalpajālā & devyāḥ śmaśāne karavīrakākhye'' iti dṛśā bhasmaśabdavyākhyānavarṇitasvarūpe
GR13cakbhavu:318_1: mahāpāśupatodyāne, bhairavāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ patir akalitaciccakreśvarātmakas tadudyāne
GR13cakbhavu:319: sarvātiśāyini, viśramya ananyatayā pratiṣṭhāṃ prāpya, ata eva kaś cid
GR13cakbhavu:323: ityādinā rājānakotpaladevanirvarṇitasvarūpasya śambhoḥ śreyaḥprabhavasya bhāvena sarvabhāvaikyasamāpattisamāveśamayena nutiṃ parāṃ cakre, iti
GR13cakbhavu:328: stotre bhāvopahāre vivaraṇam akarod ramyadevo dvijanmā
